pros: High, consistent damage throughout every stage of the game
Does not suffer from animation lock (end delay) on their skills

Lots of mobility
  • Able to reposition and dodge boss attacks
  • Can traverse the map quickly
Capable of tanking one-hit KOs and super knockbacks
cons: Requires good character control and practice
Short range on main attack skills

extraContent.title: Gauge and Combo Mechanics
extraContent.content:
Referenced from Repentant

Ammo Resource:

A resource required to use Revolving Cannon and Detonate. Once your Ammo resource is depleted, you will need to reload which is done automatically when your Ammo is empty

Dynamo Gauge:

This resource is exclusively used to activate Bunker Buster Explosion. You gain one Dynamo Gauge bar whenever you use Revolving Cannon. Once is used, you enter an Overheat state where your gauge is set to max but you cannot charge the Dynamo Gauge or use

Charge Skills:

Skills with a 'C' on the Skill Icon are Charge Skills. These skills can be held and charged while using other skills. When fully charged, releasing these Charge Skills while using other skills will cancel that skill and instead activate the Charge Skill and create an additional shockwave attack. This is used for Animation Canceling There are four Charge Skills:

  • Bobbing [2nd Job]
  • Weaving [3rd Job]
  • Hammer Smash [3rd Job]
  • Hyper Magnum Punch [Hyper Skill]

Bobbing and Weaving are your main Charge Skills that are used mainly for Animation Canceling. Although, they cannot cancel all skills like Ballistic Hurricane's uppercut, Bullet Blast's rush, and Decent Skill buffs While charging, attacks won't knock you back. You can hold up to 2 Charge skills at once. The charging animation is invisible and an orange aura will surround your character when the Charge skill is ready

primary.desc: Throws a rock that deals fixed damage
Makes you invisible similar which when activated, you cannot hit or be hit by enemies similar to Dark Sight
Punches forward
details: Can use Revolving Cannon while attacking

primary.desc: Consumes 1 Ammo to create an additional explosive attack
details:
Cannot be used on its own and must be combined with other skills
  • Can be used on skills with a 'F' on the Skill Icon
Charges your Dynamo Gauge by 1
Holding down the Skill Key will manually reload your Ammo

primary.desc: Depletes all of your Dynamo Gauge to release a massive explosion
details: Requires 3 or more Dynamo Guage bars to use
Attack has increased %Ignore DEF
After using, you will Overheat briefly which sets your Dynamax Gauge to max but you cannot charge the Dynamo Gauge or use

primary.desc: Double jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice
Some players may not put SP into this to gain better control of other mobile abilities

primary.desc: Fires your cannon, recoiling you backward
details:
Using this Skill while in the air holding the Up Arrow Key will propel you upward
  • Unaffected by Damage Reflect
  • Skill cannot be used while reloading

primary.desc: When hit, you convert a portion of the damage taken into a shield that slowly disappears
details: Additionally, when using Blaster skills, you gain 100% Knockback Resistance
[Passive]: Permanently increases %Knockback Resistance, %Max HP and grants flat DEF

primary.desc: Whenever you have at least 1 Dynamo Gauge bar, when you attack with your Arm Cannon, you will deal an additional attack
details: The damage of the attack increases depending on your Dynamo Gauge
[Passive]: Permanently increases Movement Speed, Jump and Max Movement Speed

primary.desc: Performs two punches in front of you
details: Pressing twice will also trigger this skill
Can use Revolving Cannon while attacking

primary.desc: Dashes forward while avoiding enemy attacks
details: You gain increased %Avoidability after dashing
You can jump to cancel the dash
If activated after charging (pressing down), any skill that was already activated will be immediately canceled and you will dash forward
[Passive]: Permanently increases %p Damage of

primary.desc: Increases Attack Speed (by 2 stages)
Decreases the charge time required for all Charge Skills (marked by a 'C' on icon)
details: Using a Charge Skill will also reload your Ammo by 1 immediately but will not interrupt auto-reload
After using any Charge Skill, you will briefly gain increased %Damage Reduction (including %Max HP attacks)
[Passive]: Permanently increases %Damage

primary.desc: Increases the %p Damage of , , and of during

Additionally increases the capacity of your Ammo and Dynamo Gauge

details: [Debuff]: Enemies take increased %Final Damage from Blaster
[Passive]: Permanently increases %p Damage of
While charging, attacks won't knock you back
Shockwave is not affected by Damage Reflect

details: You gain increased %Avoidability after dashing
You can jump to cancel the dash
If activated after charging (pressing down), any skill that was already activated will be immediately canceled and you will dash forward
[Passive]: Permanently increases %p Damage of

details: Pressing the Skill Key again while dashing will activate Magnum Launch

primary.desc: When hit, you convert a portion of the damage taken into a shield that slowly disappears

details: Every 6 stacks, you gain increased Attack Speed (by 1 stage)
Every 10 stacks, increased Link Speed between linking skills
Additionally, permanently increases %Attack

primary.desc: Punches forward creating a powerful blast that creates a shockwave
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %p Damage of

Can only be used during

Will not activate if there are no enemies in range

While you grab the enemy, you are invincible but immobile

  • Using at 6 bars or higher will increase the %Damage of the skill and create a more powerful attack

Increases Abnormal Status and %Elemental Resistance provided

While charging, the effects of are activated and you gain increased Abnormal Status Resistance
While charging, you gain increased %Final Damage whenever you are hit

fifthMain.name: Rocket Punch
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000, Duration: 45 sec. Using your arm cannon while active triggers Revolving Cannon Boost, which uses special ammunition. Does not apply to 5th Job Advancement skills.\nMax Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 355%, Number of Attacks: 8, Enemy DEF Ignored: 100%\nCooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: While active, your attacks trigger additional explosions
details: will be replaced while this skill is active
The explosion will consume 1 Ammo
Attack has 100% Ignore DEF

fifthMain.name: Gatling Punch
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 60, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 1000%, Number of Attacks: 12. Deals 850% damage 8 times consecutively for up to 4 sec while the key is held.
Grants the Enhanced Guard effects of Charge Mastery and Combo Training with max stacks.
Final damage increases by 10% every hit up to 100%.
Cooldown: 60 sec
fifthMain.desc: Throws a rapid barrage of punches out in front of you
details: Activates effects of and at max stack
Deals increased %Final Damage for every hit (up to 100%)

fifthMain.name: Bullet Blast
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Ammo Cost: 1
Can prepare for up to 5 sec, adds up to 5 bullets by using the Revolving Cannon, launches an explosion in proportion to the number of bullets used after Charge when the key is released. Invincible during preparation and Charge. Combo Training remains at the max level while casting skill.
Charge: Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 3000%, Number of Attacks: 15
Explosion: Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 2400%, Number of Attacks: 15
All hits receive Additional Critical Rate: +100% and Additional Monster DEF Ignored: +100%
Cooldown: 100 sec
fifthMain.desc: Dashes forward and creates a massive explosion behind you
details: Consumes 1 Ammo

While holding down the Skill Key, using will consume additional Ammo (up to 5) to create a more powerful explosion
  • You are invincible while charging
Activates the effects of and remains at max stack while casting
Attack has increased %100 Ignore DEF and is a guaranteed Critical Hit

fifthMain.name: Afterimage Shock
fifthMain.shortDesc: Cooldown: 240 seconds.\n Active Effect: MP Cost: 1,000. Upon successful hits with Arm Cannon's direct attacks, this skill creates afterimages that deal 5 additional attacks with 900% damage for 180 seconds. Afterimages can be created up to 99 times. Reoccurrence Cooldown: 0.1 second\n Passive Effect: During Afterimage Shock's cooldown, upon successful hits with the Arm Cannon, this skill creates afterimages, which attack up to 7 enemies that have not been hit with 1,000% damage up to 3 times. Active and Passive Effects cannot trigger simultaneously. Reoccurrence Cooldown: 6 seconds.
fifthMain.desc: While active, an additional attack will appear whenever you use a Gauntlet Revolver attack
details: Additional attack can only appear up to 99 times
[Passive]: While the skill is on cooldown, Gauntlet Revolver attacks create a different additional attack that damages nearby enemies

meta: Blaster is a STR warrior class part of the Resistance class group. Blasters are known to be high-APM compared to other classes and have a big learning curve. Additionally, Blasters have two additional types of resources, Ammo and a Dynamo Gauge. Certain skills will consume Ammo to use and charge up your Dynamo Gauge to unleash powerful attacks
